Comments_List: How to conduct research as a member of an intellectual cohort such that we may be able to learn from each others' writings, critiques, and advice.
If you want to do research in Japanese history, this sure is the course for you!
Definitely for those who aspire to embark on (or are already on) academic endeavour in historical studies.
